item.title: OCR and Object Recognition using Tesseract and RVision
item.description: In this post, I intend to share my experience working with a couple of very interesting libraries in R and help you explore some of their features such as image to text translation and also building a simple ‘color based’ object detection program Here are the libraries I used for some experiments that follow Tesseract - A library used to perform Optical character recognition or OCR (https://github.com/ropensci/tesseract) RVision - A basic computer vision library which is fairly new and still in development (https://github.

item.title: Is age just a number for strikers in world football?
item.description: Premise.. Recently, I recently came across a very interesting dataset on Kaggle which contains attributes of various world footballers. As a huge fan of strikers like Didier Drogba, Diego Forlan and Ronaldo (the Brazilian one) - I decided to explore the impact of age on the attributes of center forwards or strikers who are nearing the end of their careers or to say the least, dont qualify as ‘youngsters’ anymore.
